verbs.description: In his obsessive pursuit , Robert Mueller [V: has] deprived Trump of his right to the counsel of his choice . This precedent will next apply to all Americans .
[ARGM-LOC: In his obsessive pursuit] , [ARG0: Robert Mueller] has [V: deprived] [ARG2: Trump] [ARG1: of his right to the counsel of his choice] . This precedent will next apply to all Americans .
In his obsessive pursuit , Robert Mueller has deprived Trump of his right to the counsel of his choice . This precedent [V: will] next apply to all Americans .
